Container.Name: Pattrmm
Container.Overview:
Automate a chronological 'Returning Soon' Trakt list and overlay file for use in Kometa (formerly Plex Meta Manager).
ghcr.io/insertdisc/pattrmm/

Config.Name: Run Now
Config.Description: Set to 'True' to immediately do a run and then exit when finished when the container starts. (Currently only available on the nightly branch.)

Config.Name: Run Time
Config.Description: Set time to run for Pattrmm (in 24h format). Preferably not when Plex, Kometa, TitleCardMaker etc. are running their sceduled tasks.

Config.Name: Data Path
Config.Description: Data files created by Pattrmm, should be in your appdata folder for pattrmm but can be somewhere else.

Config.Name: Preferences
Config.Description: Preferences files created by Pattrmm on first run only, should be in your appdata folder for pattrmm but can be somewhere else.

Config.Name: Kometa Config
Config.Description: Path to your Kometa config.yml. Make sure Pattrmm has access/the correct permissions to read the file.
